name: Quick Ascent
description:
Quick Ascent is a little platformer with climbing and swinging elements made for Chill Jam. Grab your ice axes and rope and scale the mountain in any way you can while pushing against wind, dodging falling icicles, and maintaining your footing on slippery surfaces.

Gamepad controls (recommended):
Move - Joystick left/right
Jump - A
Hook into ice - L2/R2
Tether to grappling hook - X

Keyboard controls:
Move - A and D
Jump - Spacebar
Hook into ice - J
Tether to grappling hook - K

BGM is Black Diamond by Joth: opengameart.org/users/joth
SFX are various sound files all found on opengameart.org
Some sprites and tilesets used are from BigManJD: assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/platformer-tileset-pixelart-snow-mountain-220095

Special thanks to rnukez for assistance with the concept, art assets and generally helping me get to the finish line, as well as polywag for the early feedback (even if I didn't have time to implement it all!)
